summary: Notifications and Scheduler system fully tested. All backend API endpoints and frontend features working correctly. Backend: 21/21 tests passed. Frontend: 12/12 E2E tests passed. The module provides in-app notifications with a bell icon dropdown, mark as read functionality, and scheduled climate verification with configurable timing, frequency and notification targets. Email notifications are prepared but disabled until RESEND_API_KEY is configured.
seed_data_creation: Test notifications created and cleaned up during tests. No persistent seed data created.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Notifications and Scheduler system fully tested. Backend endpoints: GET /api/notificaciones (list user notifications), GET /api/notificaciones/count (unread count), PUT /api/notificaciones/{id}/leer (mark as read), PUT /api/notificaciones/leer-todas (mark all as read), POST /api/notificaciones (create notification - Admin/Manager), DELETE /api/notificaciones/{id} (delete - Admin), GET /api/notificaciones/scheduler/config (get scheduler config), PUT /api/notificaciones/scheduler/config (update config - Admin), POST /api/notificaciones/scheduler/ejecutar (manual execution - Admin/Manager), GET /api/notificaciones/scheduler/status (scheduler status). Frontend tested: bell icon with badge, dropdown opening/closing, displaying notifications, mark all as read button, Configuracion page with scheduler panel, Ejecutar Ahora button, configuration options (time, frequency, notification checkboxes), save config, email disabled badge.

backend_endpoints: GET /api/notificaciones/count - Get unread count for badge
PUT /api/notificaciones/{id}/leer - Mark single notification as read
PUT /api/notificaciones/leer-todas - Mark all notifications as read
frontend_features: Notifications display correctly in dropdown with icons and timestamps
Dropdown closes when clicking bell again
Mark all as read button works
Ejecutar Ahora button triggers manual verification
Email disabled badge shows when no API key

notes.email_integration: Email notifications are PREPARED but DISABLED until RESEND_API_KEY environment variable is set. The code structure is in place for future Resend integration.
notes.scheduler_service: APScheduler is configured for periodic climate checks. The scheduler runs in background and updates status in config_scheduler collection.
